dao.name: CHK_ROOM_MN_ISEXIST_CHARACTER_COD
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) as character_cod_count FROM ROOM_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = trim(:athena_id) AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND INSTR( CHARACTER_RMK, '''' || trim(:character_cod) || '''' ) > 0 AND ROWNUM <= 1

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, bed_sta from room_mn where trim(athena_id) = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = ?

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_ROOM_MN
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, build_nos, floor_nos, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, trim(clean_cod) as clean_cod, conn_room, character_rmk, oos_sta, osreson_rmk, level_nos, bed_sta, user_rmk, ci_dat, co_dat, adult_qnt, child_qnt, baby_qnt, alarm_dat, pre_alarm_dat, view_seq, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from room_mn where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) and trim(room_nos) = trim(?)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_QRY_BUILD_NOS
dao.statement: select distinct build_nos as display, build_nos as value from room_mn where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) order by build_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_QRY_FLOOR_NOS
dao.statement: select distinct floor_nos as display, floor_nos as value from room_mn where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) order by floor_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_NOS_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) room_count from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_nos) = trim(:conn_room)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_CONN_ROOM
dao.statement: select conn_room from room_mn where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?) and trim(room_nos) = trim(?) and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_ROOM_NOS
dao.statement: select unique substr(room_nos, 1, 1) as room_nos from room_mn where athena_id = ? and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(?)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_SORT_BY_VIEW_SEQ
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, bed_sta from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by view_seq, room_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_SORT_BY_ROOM_NOS
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, bed_sta from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by room_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_SORT_BY_ROOM_NOS_LENG
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, bed_sta from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by length(trim(room_nos)),room_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_MN_SORT_BY_BUILD_NOS
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_nos, room_cod, room_sta, assign_sta, clean_sta, bed_sta from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by build_nos,floor_nos, length(trim(room_nos)),room_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select room_cod as value, room_cod as display from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) group by room_cod order by room_cod

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_BUILD
dao.statement: select build_nos as value, build_nos as display from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) group by build_nos order by build_nos

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_FLOOR
dao.statement: select floor_nos as value, floor_nos as display from room_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) group by floor_nos order by floor_nos
